# Retrieve data
## European countries

```{r} 
file.name <- paste(path.out, '/data_europe.csv',sep = '')
countries <- c("BEL","CHE","DNK","ALB", "BGR","CYP","EST", "AND","BIH", "CZE","FIN","AUT","BLR", "DEU",
               "DNK","HRV","ISL","FRA","GBR","HUN","ITA","GRC", "IRL", "LIE")
europe    <- sapply(countries, function(x) {print(x);return(get_data(x, obj.name = "data.europe"))})
write.csv(data.europe,file.name, row.names = TRUE)
summary.europe <- summary(data.europe)
```

## North America
```{r} 
file.name <- paste(path.out, '/data_north_america.csv',sep = '')
countries             <- c("ATG","BHS", "BRB", "BMU","CAN", "CRI", "USA", "CUB","DMA","DOM","SLV","GRD", "GTM", 
                           "HTI", "HND", "JAM", 'MEX', "NIC", "PAN","PRI","TTO","VIR")
north.america         <- sapply(countries, function(x) {print(x);return(get_data(x, obj.name = "data.north.america"))})
write.csv(data.north.america,file.name, row.names = TRUE)
summary.north.america <- summary(data.north.america)
```


## South America
```{r} 
file.name <- paste(path.out, '/data_south_america.csv',sep = '')

south.america         <- sapply(countries, function(x) {print(x);return(get_data(x, obj.name = "data.south.america"))})
write.csv(data.south.america,file.name, row.names = TRUE)
summary.south.america <- summary(data.south.america)
```   


## Oceania

## Africa
```{r} 
file.name <- paste(path.out, '/data_africa.csv',sep = '')
countries      <- c("AGO", "BEN", "BWA", "BFA", "BDI","CMR","CPV", "CAF", "TCD", "COM","COG","COD","DJI","EGY","GNQ","ERI","SWZ","ETH","GAB","GMB","GHA",
                    "GIN","GNB","CIV","KEN","LSO","LBR","LBY","MDG","MWI","MLI","MRT","MUS","MAR","MOZ","NAM","NER","NGA","STP","RWA","STP", "RWA","STP",
                    "SEN","SYC","SLE","SOM","ZAF","SSD", "SDN","SWZ","TZA","TGO","TUN","UGA","COD","ZMB","TZA","ZWE")
```   

## Merge all the data
```{r}
data.all.continents <- rbind(data.north.america, data.oceania, data.europe, data.south.america, data.africa)
summary.all.continents <- summary(data.all.continents)
```

## Ranks 
### Europe
```{r}
ranks.europe <- as.data.frame(sapply(data.europe, rank))
summary(ranks.europe)
```

### North America
```{r}

summary(ranks.north.america)
```

# Wilcox.test
## Europe 
```{r}
wilcox.test(data.europe$confirmed,data.africa$confirmed)

```

```{r}
wilcox.test(data.europe$confirmed,data.asia$confirmed)
```       
```{r}
wilcox.test(data.europe$confirmed,data.south.america$confirmed)
```
```{r}
wilcox.test(data.europe$confirmed,data.north.america$confirmed)
```
```{r}
wilcox.test(data.europe$confirmed,data.oceania$confirmed)
```
